==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|きょ|りゅう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=きょりゅう}} compound {{m|ltc|去留|tr=*kiù *liou}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|去留|tr=qùliú}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|h|きょ|りゅう}}<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[kjo̞ɾjɯᵝː]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きょりゅう}}

# [[going]] and [[staying]], going or staying
#* Diary entry, 1943/09/28, by [[w:Kafū Nagai|Kafū Nagai]]:
#*: {{lang|ja|未'''去留'''を決すること能はざるなり。}}
#*:: {{lang|ja|いまだ'''きょりゅう'''をけっすることあたはざるなり。}}
#*:: ''Ima da '''kyoryū''' o kessuru koto atawazaru nari.''
#*::: I still can't decide on '''going or staying'''.
